mapper.sql: AuditStateId, Auditor1Id, Auditor2Id, DearerId, Id, InvoiceDetailsId, InvoiceTypeId, OperatorId, ProverId, CreateDate, OccurDate, Content, Money, Penalty, Description, ProjectName, PhotoUrl, Remark
mapper.select: SELECT Invoice.Id, Invoice.CreateDate, Invoice.OccurDate, Invoice.Content, Invoice.Money, Invoice.Penalty, Invoice.Description, Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId, Invoice.InvoiceTypeId, Invoice.ProjectName, Invoice.OperatorId, Invoice.ProverId, Invoice.Auditor1Id, Invoice.Auditor2Id, Invoice.AuditStateId, Invoice.PhotoUrl, Invoice.Remark, Invoice.DearerId, InvoiceType.Id invoice_type_id, InvoiceType.`Name` invoice_type_name, InvoiceDetails.Id invoice_details_id, InvoiceDetails.Content1 invoice_details_content1, InvoiceDetails.Content2 invoice_details_content2, InvoiceDetails.Content3 invoice_details_content3, InvoiceDetails.Content4 invoice_details_content4, AuditState.Id audit_state_id, AuditState.Operator audti_state_operator, AuditState.Prover audti_state_prover, AuditState.Auditor1 audti_state_auditor1, AuditState.Auditor2 audti_state_auditor2, AuditState.Dearer audti_state_dearer FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceType ON Invoice.InvoiceTypeId = InvoiceType.Id JOIN InvoiceDetails ON Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId = InvoiceDetails.Id JOIN AuditState ON Invoice.AuditStateId = AuditState.Id

SELECT Invoice.Id, Invoice.CreateDate, Invoice.OccurDate, Invoice.Content, Invoice.Money, Invoice.Penalty, Invoice.Description, Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId, Invoice.InvoiceTypeId, Invoice.ProjectName, Invoice.OperatorId, Invoice.ProverId, Invoice.Auditor1Id, Invoice.Auditor2Id, Invoice.AuditStateId, Invoice.PhotoUrl, Invoice.Remark, Invoice.DearerId, InvoiceType.Id invoice_type_id, InvoiceType.`Name` invoice_type_name, InvoiceDetails.Id invoice_details_id, InvoiceDetails.Content1 invoice_details_content1, InvoiceDetails.Content2 invoice_details_content2, InvoiceDetails.Content3 invoice_details_content3, InvoiceDetails.Content4 invoice_details_content4, AuditState.Id audit_state_id, AuditState.Operator audti_state_operator, AuditState.Prover audti_state_prover, AuditState.Auditor1 audti_state_auditor1, AuditState.Auditor2 audti_state_auditor2, AuditState.Dearer audti_state_dearer FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceType ON Invoice.InvoiceTypeId = InvoiceType.Id JOIN InvoiceDetails ON Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId = InvoiceDetails.Id JOIN AuditState ON Invoice.AuditStateId = AuditState.Id

SELECT Invoice.Id, Invoice.CreateDate, Invoice.OccurDate, Invoice.Content, Invoice.Money, Invoice.Penalty, Invoice.Description, Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId, Invoice.InvoiceTypeId, Invoice.ProjectName, Invoice.OperatorId, Invoice.ProverId, Invoice.Auditor1Id, Invoice.Auditor2Id, Invoice.AuditStateId, Invoice.PhotoUrl, Invoice.Remark, Invoice.DearerId, InvoiceType.Id invoice_type_id, InvoiceType.`Name` invoice_type_name, InvoiceDetails.Id invoice_details_id, InvoiceDetails.Content1 invoice_details_content1, InvoiceDetails.Content2 invoice_details_content2, InvoiceDetails.Content3 invoice_details_content3, InvoiceDetails.Content4 invoice_details_content4, AuditState.Id audit_state_id, AuditState.Operator audti_state_operator, AuditState.Prover audti_state_prover, AuditState.Auditor1 audti_state_auditor1, AuditState.Auditor2 audti_state_auditor2, AuditState.Dearer audti_state_dearer FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceType ON Invoice.InvoiceTypeId = InvoiceType.Id JOIN InvoiceDetails ON Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId = InvoiceDetails.Id JOIN AuditState ON Invoice.AuditStateId = AuditState.Id
ProverId=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR Auditor1Id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR Auditor2Id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR DearerId=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT Invoice.Id, Invoice.CreateDate, Invoice.OccurDate, Invoice.Content, Invoice.Money, Invoice.Penalty, Invoice.Description, Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId, Invoice.InvoiceTypeId, Invoice.ProjectName, Invoice.OperatorId, Invoice.ProverId, Invoice.Auditor1Id, Invoice.Auditor2Id, Invoice.AuditStateId, Invoice.PhotoUrl, Invoice.Remark, Invoice.DearerId, InvoiceType.Id invoice_type_id, InvoiceType.`Name` invoice_type_name, InvoiceDetails.Id invoice_details_id, InvoiceDetails.Content1 invoice_details_content1, InvoiceDetails.Content2 invoice_details_content2, InvoiceDetails.Content3 invoice_details_content3, InvoiceDetails.Content4 invoice_details_content4, AuditState.Id audit_state_id, AuditState.Operator audti_state_operator, AuditState.Prover audti_state_prover, AuditState.Auditor1 audti_state_auditor1, AuditState.Auditor2 audti_state_auditor2, AuditState.Dearer audti_state_dearer FROM Invoice JOIN InvoiceType ON Invoice.InvoiceTypeId = InvoiceType.Id JOIN InvoiceDetails ON Invoice.InvoiceDetailsId = InvoiceDetails.Id JOIN AuditState ON Invoice.AuditStateId = AuditState.Id where Invoice.Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from Invoice where Id in
#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Invoice (AuditStateId, Auditor1Id, Auditor2Id, DearerId, Id, InvoiceDetailsId, InvoiceTypeId, OperatorId, ProverId, CreateDate, OccurDate, Content, Money, Penalty, Description, ProjectName, PhotoUrl, Remark ) values (#{auditstateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor1id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor2id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dearerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoicedetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoicetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{occurDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{penalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
